title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat eggs with grated Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and mix quickly with pancetta.
Remove from heat and stir in egg-cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt & tikka masala paste for 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
Fry onion until golden, then add tomato puree and simmer.
Add grilled chicken pieces and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and simmer for 5 minutes.
